name: deconstructive_tiles
title: Deconstructive Tiles
author: notquitenull
description:
Deconstructive Tiles adds new tiles which, when built, order the deconstruction of whatever is built at that position (that includes it's own ghost if placed as such -> no manual cleanup required :) ).
There are currently three tile variants, each suitable for different curcumstances.
Newly Built entities/ghosts have a 5 second grace period before they are affected by the tile.
